hotels.title: UK Heritage Sheffield Retreat with Onsite Cocktail Lounge
hotels.description: Discover regal splendour in the heart of South Yorkshire with a stay at the historic Crowne Plaza Royal Victoria Sheffield, an IHG Hotel. Originally built in 1862 and still proudly serving guests today, this sanctuary features just 105 rooms, each offering a tantalising glimpse into the idyllic charms of yesteryear. Head to Cunningham’s Restaurant for scones and seasonal high tea or sink into a fireside leather chesterfield at the Grand Lounge and sip the evening away.
